mapper.select: select count(instructor_no) instructor_check from instructor where emp_no = #{account_no}
select ifnull(instructor_no, 0) instructor_no, approval_state from instructor where emp_no = #{account_no}
mapper.insert: insert into instructor select concat('I', (select date_format(now(), '%Y%m')), (select lpad(count(*)+1, 4, '0') from instructor)), #{emp_no}, null, 1, now(), #{name};
mapper.select: select * from education_list where instructor_no = #{account_no} and approval_state != 3

select *, (select count(*) from education_history where edu_no = A.edu_no) as student from education_list A join education_detail B on A.edu_no = B.edu_no where instructor_no = #{account_no} and approval_state = 3 limit ${page}, 10
select name from employees where emp_no = #{account_no}
mapper.insert: insert into education_detail values(NULL, LAST_INSERT_ID(), STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{start_date}, ' 00:00:00'),'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s'), STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{end_date}, ' 00:00:00'),'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s'), #{input_time}, NULL, #{file_path}, #{file_ori_name}, #{file_save_name})
mapper.select: select *, C.edu_name edu_code_name, D.name instructor_name from education_list A join belong B on A.belong_no = B.belong_no left join education_code C on A.edu_code = C.edu_code left join instructor D on A.instructor_no = D.instructor_no where edu_no = #{edu_no}
select * from education_History A join employees B on A.emp_no = B.emp_no left join department C on B.dept_no = C.dept_no where edu_no = #{edu_no}
mapper.update: update education_list set edu_target = #{edu_target}, edu_way = #{edu_way}, edu_schedule = #{edu_schedule}, edu_date = #{edu_date}, edu_location = #{edu_location}, budget = #{budget}, note = #{note}, applicants_limit = #{applicants_limit}, closing_date = STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{closing_date}, ' 00:00:00'),'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') where edu_no = #{edu_no}

update education_detail set start_date = STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{start_date}, ' 00:00:00'),'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s'), end_date = STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{end_date}, ' 00:00:00'),'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s'), input_time = #{input_time}, file_path = #{file_path}, file_ori_name = #{file_ori_name}, file_save_name = #{file_save_name} where edu_no = #{edu_no}
update education_history set edu_state = #{edu_state}, instructor_eval = #{instructor_eval} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) as eduListNum from education_list where instructor_no = #{account_no} and approval_state = 3
